user.about: I've been developing since 2010. Freelancer, Founder, Developer. In love with clean-code. I've built from scratch several large projects and quite many medium-sized projects. Constantly improving my skills. I love odd humor, such as puns :)

courses.name: «TopJava» – Retraining from PHP to Java developer (enterprise level)
«BaseJava» – Retraining from PHP to Java developer

experience.companyDescription: One of the leading Russian consulting companies, specializing in Information Security.
duties: Cut monolith into microservices.
Development of new functionality.
Improvement of existing functionality.
Software design, automation.

experience.companyDescription: SAAS – a lot of marketing tools for searching target (hot) audiences.
duties: Development of the system from scratch with Symfony framework.
Development of a multi-threaded system for performing users tasks.
Managing all the infrastructure, CI/CD, deployment, updating.
Development of rich interactive UI.
Integrations with other systems.
Rich administrative panel with many unique functions.

experience.companyDescription: E-Commerce platform for selling products of official suppliers.
duties: Development of all the functions from scratch with Laravel framework.
Development of all the basic functions of an online shopping website.
Automatic importing of products from different suppliers.
Unique catalogue mechanism.
Rich and powerful administration panel.

experience.companyDescription: One of the most successful commercial CMS in Russia.
duties: Development of a data exchange module that works with the most used formats (CSV, XLSX, YML, CommerceML), provides many options for end-users (manual/semi-automatic/automatic run mode, automatic data downloading, logging, reports sending, etc).
Improving and rewriting the CMS kernel while working on major version of CMS (6.0).
CMS integration with Yandex.Delivery.

experience.companyDescription: Web sites development: landing pages, online shopping sites, corporate websites, etc.
duties: Different business logic development for different web-projects.
NetCat CMS modules development.
Websites optimisations, business logic optimisations.
Exchanges with different systems like 1C, Yandex.Market and other sites and systems.
